10
11#include "p2p/base/regathering_controller.h"
12#include "rtc_base/task_utils/to_queued_task.h"
13
14namespace webrtc {
15
16BasicRegatheringController::BasicRegatheringController(
17 const Config& config,
18 cricket::IceTransportInternal* ice_transport,
19 rtc::Thread* thread)
20 : config_(config), ice_transport_(ice_transport), thread_(thread) {
21 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(thread_);
22 RTC_DCHECK(ice_transport_);
23 ice_transport_->SignalStateChanged.connect(
24 this, &BasicRegatheringController::OnIceTransportStateChanged);
25 ice_transport->SignalWritableState.connect(
26 this, &BasicRegatheringController::OnIceTransportWritableState);
27 ice_transport->SignalReceivingState.connect(
28 this, &BasicRegatheringController::OnIceTransportReceivingState);
29 ice_transport->SignalNetworkRouteChanged.connect(
30 this, &BasicRegatheringController::OnIceTransportNetworkRouteChanged);
31}
32
33BasicRegatheringController::~BasicRegatheringController() {
34 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(thread_);
35}
36
37void BasicRegatheringController::Start() {
38 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(thread_);
39 ScheduleRecurringRegatheringOnFailedNetworks();
40}
41
42void BasicRegatheringController::SetConfig(const Config& config) {
43 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(thread_);
44 bool need_reschedule_on_failed_networks =
45 pending_regathering_ && (config_.regather_on_failed_networks_interval !=
46 config.regather_on_failed_networks_interval);
47 config_ = config;
48 if (need_reschedule_on_failed_networks) {
49 ScheduleRecurringRegatheringOnFailedNetworks();
50 }
51}
52
53void BasicRegatheringController::
54 ScheduleRecurringRegatheringOnFailedNetworks() {
55 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(thread_);
56 RTC_DCHECK(config_.regather_on_failed_networks_interval >= 0);
57 // Reset pending_regathering_ to cancel any potentially pending tasks.
58 pending_regathering_.reset(new ScopedTaskSafety());
59
60 thread_->PostDelayedTask(
61 ToQueuedTask(*pending_regathering_.get(),
62 [this]() {
63 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(thread_);
64 // Only regather when the current session is in the CLEARED
65 // state (i.e., not running or stopped). It is only
66 // possible to enter this state when we gather continually,
67 // so there is an implicit check on continual gathering
68 // here.
69 if (allocator_session_ &&
70 allocator_session_->IsCleared()) {
71 allocator_session_->RegatherOnFailedNetworks();
72 }
73 ScheduleRecurringRegatheringOnFailedNetworks();
74 }),
75 config_.regather_on_failed_networks_interval);
76}
77
78} // namespace webrtc
79
